main event: A stationary unidentified flying object was observed in Reseda, California on April 18, 1957.
interesting points: The object was clear and observed at an altitude of 1000 feet,It moved straight upward during the observation,The core of the object was yellow and flickering,There were no distinct edges and it made no sound,The sighting lasted between 3 to 9 minutes.
sighted object: one stationary object resembling a DG-6
witness description: The observer described the object as a bright sphere-like light with an elliptical outer glow.
